giantspawn-fabric.duskconfig.title: Giant Spawn Config
giantspawn-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_chance: The chance a zombie that has spawned on the surface is a giant.
giantspawn-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_should: If enabled, burns giants when daylight shines upon them.
giantspawn-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_onlySp: If enabled, a giant will only spawn on the surface.
giantspawn-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_giantM: The giant movement speed modifier relative to the base zombie movement speed.
giantspawn-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_giantA: The giant attack damage modifier relative to the base zombie attack damage.
